trans-unit.source: Draws a series of connected straight lines.
trans-unit.target: 绘制一系列相互连接的直线。

trans-unit.source: This object is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polygon> object, except that this object does not need to be a closed shape.
trans-unit.target: 此对象是类似于<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polygon>对象，只不过此对象不需要是闭合的形状。</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polygon>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FillRule"></xref> enumeration that specifies how the interior fill of the shape is determined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FillRule"></xref>指定如何确定形状内部填充的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>枚举值确定的形状上的点的"内部性"。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>

trans-unit.source: It draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and counts the number of path segments from the specified shape that the ray crosses.
trans-unit.target: 它从点沿任意方向绘制一条射线，并对指定形状与射线相交的路径段的数量进行计数。

trans-unit.source: If the number is odd, the point is inside; if it is even, the point is outside.
trans-unit.target: 如果数字为奇数，该点在内部;如果为偶数，该点位于外部。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>枚举值确定的形状上的点的"内部性"。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>

trans-unit.source: It first draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and then examines the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray.
trans-unit.target: 它首先从点沿任意方向绘制一条射线，然后检查段形状与射线相交的位置。

trans-unit.source: It starts with a count of zero, adding one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtracting one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 计数为零，启动一个每个时间段交叉从左到右的射线和减去一个每个时间路径段中添加与射线相交从右到左。

trans-unit.source: After it counts the crossings, if the result is zero, the point is outside the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果为零，它会计算在对交叉点进行点后，位于路径外。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is inside.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它在内部。

trans-unit.source: ![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule Example ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ![填充规则图](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填充规则图")FillRule 示例 # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FillRule"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FillRule"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FillRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FillRule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline.FillRule*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline.FillRule*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline.FillRule*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection that contains the vertex points of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含的顶点的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], use a space-delimited list of comma-separated x- coordinate and y-coordinate pairs to set this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，用空格分隔的以逗号分隔的 x 坐标和 y 坐标对列表用于设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use simple notation, that is, `x`1`,y`1 `x`2`,y`2 ... `x`n`,y`n.
trans-unit.target: 使用简单表示法，即`x`1`,y`1 `x`2`,y`2...`x`n`,y`n.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structures that describe the vertex points of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>描述的顶点的结构<xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline.Points*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline.Points*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline.Points*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
